message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which I believe is worth more than $1,200,000 to you, is now being offered exclusively to you at a special price. My proposal is to sell this product to you for $1,150,000. This offer represents an exceptional chance for you to secure an item that could potentially increase in value over time and provide significant benefits to you. I trust that you will find this proposition compelling and look forward to discussing its details further with you.
